Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Our findings suggest that the changes leading to an alteration of myocardial dynamic imaging with I - 131 HA are not the initiating factor in doxorubicin cardiotoxicity .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| I-131 HA |
| doxorubicin |

Explanation:

The paragraph mentions two chemical entities: "I-131 HA" and "doxorubicin". "I-131 HA" refers to Iodine-131 labeled human albumin, a radiopharmaceutical used in medical imaging. "Doxorubicin" is an anticancer drug known to cause cardiotoxicity.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| I-131 HA (Iodine-131 labeled human albumin) |
| doxorubicin |

Explanation:

The paragraph mentions two clear chemical entities: "I-131 HA" and "doxorubicin". "I-131 HA" is a radiopharmaceutical composed of iodine-131 isotope and human albumin. "Doxorubicin" is an anticancer drug. Both entities are chemicals.
